card.name: Ardent Plea
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.name: Aven Mimeomancer
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a feather counter on target creature. If you do, that creature has base power and toughness 3/1 and has flying for as long as it has a feather counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the skies are our only refuge, I will see all of us take wing."

card.name: Ethercaste Knight
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We coat ourselves in steel every day. What is etherium but the next logical step?"

card.name: Ethersworn Shieldmage
card.property: Flash When Ethersworn Shieldmage enters the battlefield, prevent all damage that would be dealt to artifact creatures this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "See, children of metal? Already your bodies are rejecting harm. Continue on our path, and perfection will be yours."

card.name: Fieldmist Borderpost
card.property: You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Fieldmist Borderpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Filigree Angel
card.property: Flying When Filigree Angel enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I craved enlightenment, and Crucius's etherium opened my eyes. I would share my sight with you, but first you must believe."

card.name: Glassdust Hulk
card.property: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Glassdust Hulk gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. Cycling {W/U} ({W/U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Meddling Mage
card.property: As Meddling Mage enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name. Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This violent wasteland is an indictment of its people. These cowards lack the will to oppose disorder."

card.name: Offering to Asha
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}. You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "His body belongs to Bant now. His soul? I honestly don't know. I expect it belongs to the angels." —Rafiq of the Many

card.name: Sanctum Plowbeast
card.property: Defender Plainscycling {2}, islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Shield of the Righteous
Sovereigns of Lost Alara
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may search your library for an Aura card that could enchant that creature, put it onto the battlefield attached to that creature, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Stormcaller's Boon
card.property: Sacrifice Stormcaller's Boon: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn. Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.name: Talon Trooper
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The volcanic winds make a maze of the skies of Jund. If we mean to invade, we must first learn their invisible paths."

card.name: Unbender Tine
card.property: {T}: Untap another target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Creations made in madness may contain great power. The path to that power is as labyrinthine as the creator's mind.

card.name: Wall of Denial
card.property: Defender, flying Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It provides what every discerning mage requires—time to think.

card.name: Architects of Will
card.property: When Architects of Will enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. Cycling {U/B} ({U/B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This secret society of mages manipulates the beliefs and opinions of others.

card.name: Brainbite
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An Esper mage will leave a hole in your memory with surgical precision. A Grixis mage sees no reason to be so kind.

card.name: Deny Reality
card.property: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.) Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Etherium Abomination
card.property: Unearth {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was given life by the etherium of a hundred slain Esperites.

card.name: Illusory Demon
card.property: Flying When you cast a spell, sacrifice Illusory Demon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Maelstrom, a trick of the light can feast on human flesh.

card.name: Jhessian Zombies
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Islandcycling {2}, swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Kathari Remnant
card.property: Flying {B}: Regenerate Kathari Remnant. Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.name: Lich Lord of Unx
Mask of Riddles
Mind Funeral
card.property: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until four land cards are revealed. That player puts all cards revealed this way into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The soul is only as eternal as I say it is." —Sharuum the Hegemon

card.name: Mistvein Borderpost
card.property: You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Mistvein Borderpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Nemesis of Reason
card.property: Whenever Nemesis of Reason attacks, defending player puts the top ten cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Words describing it fail. Pages relating it shrivel. Tales recounting it end.

card.name: Soul Manipulation
card.property: Choose one or both — • Counter target creature spell. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Birth and death are both reversible." —Nicol Bolas

card.name: Soulquake
card.property: Return all creatures on the battlefield and all creature cards in graveyards to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Maelstrom sent a wave of raw mana through the battlefield, carrying off the fighting and fallen alike.

card.name: Time Sieve
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice five artifacts: Take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I pray that I am never considered useless or old." —Sharuum the Hegemon

card.name: Vedalken Ghoul
card.property: Whenever Vedalken Ghoul becomes blocked, defending player loses 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For four nights following Ennor's death and the reclaiming of his etherium, its recipients were found slain, the etherium ripped from their bodies.

card.name: Anathemancer
card.property: When Anathemancer enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target player equal to the number of nonbasic lands that player controls. Unearth {5}{B}{R} ({5}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Bituminous Blast
card.property: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.) Bituminous Blast deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Breath of Malfegor
card.property: Breath of Malfegor deals 5 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The blood of the demons quickened as their master rose over the battlefield. The blood of the angels also quickened: here was the chance to finally end the war started millennia ago.

card.name: Deathbringer Thoctar
card.property: Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Deathbringer Thoctar. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Deathbringer Thoctar: It deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Defiler of Souls
card.property: Flying At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a monocolored creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stray not into sin, lest you face the doorman of an insatiable tomb." —Prayer of Asha

card.name: Demonic Dread
card.property: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.) Target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Demonspine Whip
card.property: {X}: Equipped creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn. Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Using a spine to break a slave's back appeals to the Grixis sense of irony.

card.name: Igneous Pouncer
card.property: Haste Swampcycling {2}, mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Kathari Bomber
card.property: Flying When Kathari Bomber deals combat damage to a player, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens and sacrifice Kathari Bomber. Unearth {3}{B}{R} ({3}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Lightning Reaver
card.property: Haste; fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever Lightning Reaver deals combat damage to a player, put a charge counter on it. At the beginning of your end step, Lightning Reaver deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to each opponent.

card.name: Monstrous Carabid
card.property: Monstrous Carabid attacks each combat if able. Cycling {B/R} ({B/R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What happens when a plane of predators collides with four planes of prey?

card.name: Sanity Gnawers
card.property: When Sanity Gnawers enters the battlefield, target player discards a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The last thought to go through their victim's mind is the one they tear out through the scalp.

card.name: Singe-Mind Ogre
card.property: When Singe-Mind Ogre enters the battlefield, target player reveals a card at random from their hand, then loses life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the balmgivers of Bant couldn't heal the incurables, but sharing their torment helped.

card.name: Terminate
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen death before. My mother succumbing to illness, my comrades bleeding on the battlefield . . . But I'd never seen anything as dreadful as that." —Taani, berserker of Etlan

card.name: Thought Hemorrhage
card.property: Choose a nonland card name. Target player reveals their hand. Thought Hemorrhage deals 3 damage to that player for each card with the chosen name revealed this way. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Veinfire Borderpost
card.property: You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Veinfire Borderpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.name: Blitz Hellion
card.property: Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, Blitz Hellion's owner shuffles it into their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Alarans commemorated its appearances with new holidays bearing names like the Great Cataclysm and the Fall of Ilson Gate.

card.name: Bloodbraid Elf
card.property: Haste Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.name: Colossal Might
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never corner a barbarian. You become the path of least resistance." —Sarkhan Vol

card.name: Deadshot Minotaur
card.property: When Deadshot Minotaur enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature with flying. Cycling {R/G} ({R/G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the earth rise up to meet you."

card.name: Dragon Broodmother
card.property: Flying At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 red and green Dragon creature token with flying and devour 2. (As the token enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. It enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)

card.name: Firewild Borderpost
card.property: You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Firewild Borderpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Godtracker of Jund
card.property: Whenever a creature with power 5 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Godtracker of Jund.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The behemoths are content to graze like cattle, while dragons rage and conquer. I know which example I'll follow."

card.name: Gorger Wurm
card.property: Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In war-torn Alara, sometimes a wurm's gullet is the safest place to be.

card.name: Mage Slayer
card.property: Whenever equipped creature attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to the player or planeswalker it's attacking. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the wielder is strong enough, any sword will do." —Kresh the Bloodbraided

card.name: Predatory Advantage
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if that player didn't cast a creature spell this turn, create a 2/2 green Lizard creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who forget their past are doomed to be eaten by it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In this new world, I have seen the once-devout rhoxes take up arms with the savages of Jund. I would be offended, but I see the wisdom in their choice." —Gernan, Dawnray archer

card.name: Spellbreaker Behemoth
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Creature spells you control with power 5 or greater can't be countered.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some think its immunity to countermagic evolved because of the constant mage attacks on Naya. I think it just ate a bunch of wizards." —Broka, drumhunter

card.name: Valley Rannet
card.property: Mountaincycling {2}, forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Vengeful Rebirth
card.property: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. If you return a nonland card to your hand this way, Vengeful Rebirth deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to any target. Exile Vengeful Rebirth.

card.name: Violent Outburst
card.property: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.) Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Vithian Renegades
card.property: When Vithian Renegades enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here is the proof that what has been done may yet be undone. The hope we thought dead will be gloriously reborn."

card.name: Behemoth Sledge
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who worship the great gargantuans could hardly be expected to fight with a subtle weapon.

card.name: Captured Sunlight
card.property: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.) You gain 4 life.

card.name: Dauntless Escort
card.property: Sacrifice Dauntless Escort: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elspeth's squires do not seek advancement. For them, no knightly glory could surpass the glory of serving their champion.

card.name: Enlisted Wurm
card.property: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A match for any army—even its own.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no glory in a death of age, as even the leotau know. As winter steals into their coats, they seek the deadliest lands, that they may die as they lived." —Aarsil the Blessed

card.name: Knight of New Alara
card.property: Each other multicolored creature you control gets +1/+1 for each of its colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I embrace all of Alara, Grixis as much as Bant. Let my former home call me traitor. I do this not for accolades, but because it is right."

card.name: Knotvine Paladin
card.property: Whenever Knotvine Paladin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each untapped creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He is part of a new breed of guardian, one who embraces the best of both his world and ours." —Mayael the Anima

card.name: Leonin Armorguard
card.property: When Leonin Armorguard enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Well suited are the nacatl to a coat of steel and forge-tempered claws.

card.name: Mycoid Shepherd
card.property: Whenever Mycoid Shepherd or another creature you control with power 5 or greater dies, you may gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As pure mana flooded across the shards, it brought a sense of unity even to Jund's vicious food chain.

card.name: Pale Recluse
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Forestcycling {2}, plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Qasali Pridemage
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {1}, Sacrifice Qasali Pridemage: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An elder in one pride, of the Sigiled caste in another.

card.name: Reborn Hope
card.property: Return target multicolored card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In darkness is kindled the fiercest hope." —Hadran, sunseeder of Naya

card.name: Sigil Captain
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature is 1/1, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One sigil awarded for valor, the other awarded for surviving Hellkite's Pass."

card.name: Sigil of the Nayan Gods
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control. Cycling {G/W} ({G/W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the elves learned the hymns of angels, the knights learned the roars of titans.

card.name: Sigiled Behemoth
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not mistake a behemoth's assistance for subservience." —Mayael the Anima

card.name: Wildfield Borderpost
card.property: You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Wildfield Borderpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

card.name: Identity Crisis
card.property: Exile all cards from target player's hand and graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To join our ranks, one must be pure. To be pure, one must be blessed by etherium. To be blessed, one must forget oneself." —Ethersworn prayer

card.name: Necromancer's Covenant
card.property: When Necromancer's Covenant enters the battlefield, exile all creature cards from target player's graveyard, then create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each card exiled this way. Zombies you control have lifelink.

card.name: Tainted Sigil
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Tainted Sigil: You gain life equal to the total life lost by all players this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sigils corrupted by outsiders do not lose their power, only their purity.

card.name: Vectis Dominator
card.property: {T}: Tap target creature unless its controller pays 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I appreciate the artistry of the telemins, but the creatures of the other worlds provide a much more dramatic performance." —Ennor, mentalist

card.name: Zealous Persecution
card.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Jharic returned from Grixis changed, a haunted look in her eyes. She destroyed them with an unholy glee that made me shudder." —Knight-Captain Wyhorn

card.name: Cloven Casting
card.property: Whenever you cast a multicolored instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let us flee to the deep jungle. Our city is no longer safe—and I suspect neither is the fallback retreat."

card.name: Double Negative
card.property: Counter up to two target spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They feared each other for their differences but were absolutely terrified at their similarities.

card.name: Magefire Wings
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Giving a thing wings does not take away its fear of flight—or its fear of fire, for that matter.

card.name: Skyclaw Thrash
card.property: Whenever Skyclaw Thrash attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, Skyclaw Thrash gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their newfound wings shined elegantly and functioned partially.

card.name: Spellbound Dragon
card.property: Flying Whenever Spellbound Dragon attacks, draw a card, then discard a card. Spellbound Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the discarded card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A king in Jund, a serf in Esper.

card.name: Lord of Extinction
card.property: Lord of Extinction's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The forlorn cries of the dead combine to make its laugh.

card.name: Maelstrom Pulse
card.property: Destroy target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During the collision of the shards, entire ways of life disappeared without a trace.

card.name: Marrow Chomper
card.property: Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.) When Marrow Chomper enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature it devoured.

card.name: Morbid Bloom
card.property: Exile target creature card from a graveyard, then create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is the exiled card's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the damned I make my garden." —Jorshu of Clan Nel Toth

card.name: Putrid Leech
card.property: Pay 2 life: Putrid Leech gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It reacted to Naya's overabundant food supply by growing additional mouths.

card.name: Cerodon Yearling
card.property: Vigilance, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The unit of measurement used to chart a cerodon's growth is "persons consumed."

card.name: Fight to the Death
card.property: Destroy all blocking creatures and all blocked creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a battlefield falls silent, it's rarely due to a cease-fire.

card.name: Glory of Warfare
card.property: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +2/+0. As long as it's not your turn, creatures you control get +0/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their hopes dashed on our shields! Their victory slashed by our swords!"

card.name: Intimidation Bolt
card.property: Intimidation Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature. Other creatures can't attack this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For hours afterward, all they could see was the grisly silhouette of their master, screaming.

card.name: Stun Sniper
card.property: {1}, {T}: Stun Sniper deals 1 damage to target creature. Tap that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tips of her bolts are blunt, but her aim is deadly sharp.

card.name: Lorescale Coatl
card.property: Whenever you draw a card, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Lorescale Coatl.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The enlightenment I never found in etherium I have found traced in the coatl's scales." —Ranalus, vedalken heretic

card.name: Nulltread Gargantuan
card.property: When Nulltread Gargantuan enters the battlefield, put a creature you control on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It crushes all underfoot, yet leaves no trace of its passage—no trampled debris, no flattened souls, not even a hoofprint.

card.name: Sages of the Anima
card.property: If you would draw a card, instead reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Godtrackers found new pantheons of beast-gods beyond Naya's borders.

card.name: Vedalken Heretic
card.property: Whenever Vedalken Heretic deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Etherium clouded my eyes, clogged my ears, desensitized my skin. Now that I can feel, I can begin to learn."

card.name: Winged Coatl
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The nacatl called this new species "vetli," their word for poison arrows.

card.name: Enigma Sphinx
card.property: Flying When Enigma Sphinx is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put it into your library third from the top. Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.name: Esper Sojourners
card.property: When you cycle Esper Sojourners or it dies, you may tap or untap target permanent. Cycling {2}{U} ({2}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wilder the frontier, the greater the need for a controlling hand.

card.name: Etherwrought Page
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one — • You gain 2 life. • Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard. • Each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An unbound page is a riddle, free of cover and of context, a favorite token of the hegemon.

card.name: Sen Triplets
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose target opponent. This turn, that player can't cast spells or activate abilities and plays with their hand revealed. You may play lands and cast spells from that player's hand this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are the masters of your mind.

card.name: Sphinx of the Steel Wind
card.property: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink, protection from red and from green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one has properly answered her favorite riddle: "Why should I spare your life?"

card.name: Drastic Revelation
card.property: Discard your hand. Draw seven cards, then discard three cards at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every disaster holds mystery, for lack of a sane witness.

card.name: Grixis Sojourners
card.property: When you cycle Grixis Sojourners or it dies, you may exile target card from a graveyard. Cycling {2}{B} ({2}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Thraximundar
card.property: Haste Whenever Thraximundar attacks, defending player sacrifices a creature. Whenever a player sacrifices a creature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Thraximundar.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His name means "he who paints the earth red."

card.name: Unscythe, Killer of Kings
Dragon Appeasement
card.property: Skip your draw step. Whenever you sacrifice a creature, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look there—they carry that one upon a sedan chair. It must be their leader. Wait . . . Oh! Perhaps not." —Kaeda, aven scout

card.name: Jund Sojourners
card.property: When you cycle Jund Sojourners or it dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target. Cycling {2}{R} ({2}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Karrthus, Tyrant of Jund
card.property: Flying, haste When Karrthus, Tyrant of Jund enters the battlefield, gain control of all Dragons, then untap all Dragons. Other Dragon creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Lavalanche
card.property: Lavalanche deals X damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Alara's burning blood cannot be contained by mere earth and stone.

card.name: Madrush Cyclops
card.property: Creatures you control have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death comes in the blink of an eye.

card.name: Gloryscale Viashino
card.property: Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, Gloryscale Viashino gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is a new world and a new war. We need warriors who know chaos and how to combat it." —Lisha of the Azure

card.name: Mayael's Aria
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control if you control a creature with power 5 or greater. Then you gain 10 life if you control a creature with power 10 or greater. Then you win the game if you control a creature with power 20 or greater.

card.name: Naya Sojourners
card.property: When you cycle Naya Sojourners or it dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves had entered a land like an open grave—an act of fortitude or folly?

card.name: Retaliator Griffin
card.property: Flying Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on Retaliator Griffin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For every eye, an eye. For every tooth, a tooth. Griffins are nothing if not fair.

card.name: Uril, the Miststalker
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Uril, the Miststalker gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It strides through the whitecover, mists in which even gargantuans can hide.

card.name: Bant Sojourners
card.property: When you cycle Bant Sojourners or it dies, you may create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must spread Bant's light before we are shadowed over."

card.name: Finest Hour
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, if it's the first combat phase of the turn, untap that creature. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Flurry of Wings
card.property: Create X 1/1 white Bird Soldier creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are born soldiers. The call to battle is a homecoming."

card.name: Jenara, Asura of War
card.property: Flying {1}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Jenara, Asura of War.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wounded soldiers looked up, grateful for her appearance. But she passed over them, her eyes firmly on their foe.

card.name: Wargate
card.property: Search your library for a permanent card with converted mana cost X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bant mages still call to the heavens for aid, but angels are not the only ones who answer.

card.name: Maelstrom Nexus

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: The first spell you cast each turn has cascade. (When you cast your first spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.name: Arsenal Thresher
card.property: As Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield, you may reveal any number of other artifact cards from your hand. Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each card revealed this way.

card.name: Esper Stormblade
card.property: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Esper Stormblade gets +1/+1 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stormcallers came to appreciate the novelty of Jund's volcanic updrafts.

card.name: Thopter Foundry
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice a nontoken artifact: Create a 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature token with flying. You gain 1 life.

card.name: Grixis Grimblade
card.property: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Grixis Grimblade gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.)

card.name: Sewn-Eye Drake
card.property: Flying, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Too wary to charge, too prudent to serve. Not anymore." —Sedris, the Traitor King

card.name: Slave of Bolas
card.property: Gain control of target creature. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nicol Bolas doesn't distinguish between servants and victims.

card.name: Giant Ambush Beetle
card.property: Haste When Giant Ambush Beetle enters the battlefield, you may have target creature block it this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It waits with absolute stillness. One might think it a statue if it weren't occasionally seen chewing on its victims.

card.name: Jund Hackblade
card.property: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Jund Hackblade gets +1/+1 and has haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The knights were halfway through their precombat rites before they realized the foul brute meant to start without them.

card.name: Sangrite Backlash
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/-3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sangrite is the dragon's beating heart. Little wonder, then, that so many fools' chests burst trying to contain it." —Sarkhan Vol

card.name: Marisi's Twinclaws
card.property: Double strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Looks like we're completely outnumbered." "Lucky for us. I thought we'd be bored."

card.name: Naya Hushblade
card.property: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Naya Hushblade gets +1/+1 and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Trace of Abundance
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

card.name: Bant Sureblade
card.property: As long as you control another multicolored permanent, Bant Sureblade gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Soldiers who fought through Grixis learned to hit first, recite the prayer of Asha later.

card.name: Crystallization
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, exile that creature.

card.name: Messenger Falcons
card.property: Flying When Messenger Falcons enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: So many aven had died scouting the distant fronts that the knight-captains recruited Nayan falcons as couriers.
